name: Kill Spill
description:
Kill Spill was made for the Global Game Jam 2017 at the Abertay location.

With the theme 'Wave' we decided to make a game based around the concept of wave based combat and waves of blood. This lead to us coming up with a number of witty, hilarious, pun based titles until 'Kill Spill' was suggested. With the title figured out we decided to heavily reference the great director Quentin Tarantino in the designs for our main character and some of the enemies.

Controls:

left/right arrows to punch

up arrow to jump

Credits:

Programming - Stuart McKie and Peter Black

Art - JL Brady

Music & Sounds - Iain McLeod

Design - Nik Balson
